hero.subtitle: Easily find parking from the comfort of your device

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Meet the team behind this innovative project

product.title: What is EzPark?
product.description: It's an app to find, reserve, and promote parking services in residential garages.

benefits.benefit1: Reduces the time spent searching for parking.
benefits.benefit3: A way to generate additional income through leasing.

features.title: Easy and Simple to Use
features.description: Intuitive, modern, and simplistic application to offer the best experience to our users.
features.body1: Choose from various options to park on the map.
features.body2: Enter the range of hours you want to use the service.
features.body3: Get close to the service location and park in the selected garage.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: EzPark is free for all users. Only pay for parking rentals and earn money for your services.
pricing.subtitle1: Choose the service at your convenience
pricing.body1: Choose the service time and rate that suits your preference.
pricing.body2: Don't run out of alternatives! Choose from the wide variety of available parking spaces.
pricing.body3: Payments gateway verified by multiple organizations and banking entities.
pricing.subtitle4: Set the rate for your parking
pricing.body4: Adjust the prices and promote your service to thousands of drivers.
pricing.body5: Generate passive and/or active daily income with our application.
pricing.body6: Direct communication with banking entities of your preference.

testimonials.title: With the trust of thousands of satisfied customers
